member_organisations: EAAM operates under a MOU with the European Association of Zoos and Aquariums and in cooperation with the Alliance of Marine Mammal Parks and Aquariums.
inter_groups: The EAAM participates from time to time in the activities of the Intergroup on Climate change, Biodiversity and Sustainable Development and the Intergroup on the Welfare and Conservation of Animals.
eu_initiatives:
- Evaluation and implementation of the EU Animal Welfare Strategy 
- Legislative and policy developments concerning animal health, welfare and conservation 
- the REFIT of the Zoos Directive
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: The EAAM was founded in 1974 and continues to support the Aquatic Mammals Journal, the oldest peer-reviewed scientific publication of its kind. The EAAM hosts an annual research symposium.
